author: kristwaa
msg: Added a simple grammar class for the protocol tests.

author: josh
msg: Fix for bug 30978 - small re-arrangement of class Ptg hierarchy for DeletedRef3DPtg and DeletedArea3DPtg. Similar to c664220

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3151: Reduce dependency on NetworkServerControl in TestConfiguration.
Added a NetworkServerControl wrapper using reflection to use the class and invoke its methods.
The purpose of the change is to be able to run JUnit tests without having derbynet.jar (and derbyrun.jar) on the classpath.
